title: Realtime Engineer - AVConference Power & Performance
summary: Our team develops the technology that powers real-time audio and video communications features such as Group FaceTime, FaceTime, SharePlay, Sidecar, Airplay 4K HDR, Phone Continuity, HomeKit IP Cameras, Wifi-Calling / VoLTE, and RTT. We support iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS. Apple's Audio and Media Technologies (AMT) is looking for a proactive and hardworking engineer to join our team focused on improving power and performance.
description: We are looking for a strong engineer to help drive improving power & performance of real-time audio and video frameworks that drive Apple's real-time communication software like FaceTime and WifiCalling. As a power & performance engineer in this role, you will be responsible for analyzing, identifying areas of improvements, and automating power and performance workflows.
preferred_qualifications: B.S or M.S or equivalent experience in EE/CE/CS with a strong focus on software engineering
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $55.64 and $83.75/hr, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
